head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HOCH, MINNIE BELLE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HOCH, MINNIE BELLE

block.p: HOCH--Minnie Belle, 93 of Baltimore. Wife of the late Myron, mother to Susan, grandmother to Jason and Jeff Schwaber. Librarian, Community College of Baltimore. Activist with WILPH. Worked for peace, social justice. Donations to Minnie Hoch Scholarship Fund c/o JAPA, 777 UN Plaza, NY, NY 10017, supporting peace studies at Goucher College.
